Description: No Broker Fee Beautiful 2 bedroom unit on the first floor in a multi-family house located within a walking distance to Airport station and Maverick Square in East Boston. Unit features a living room and an updated kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Hardwood floors throughout. Coin-op laundry in the basement. On-street parking with a residential permit. Easy access to the blue line, park, stores, restaurants and shops. Cat friendly for $150/month. Dog is considered on a case by case basis for an additional $200/month upon landlord's approval.
